meanings.definition: Enzymes that catalyze the hydrolysis of disaccharides into monosaccharides.
meanings.sent1: The saccharases in our bodies help break down sugars into simpler forms.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study saccharases to understand how they convert complex sugars into simpler ones.
meanings.sent3: The saccharases at the party were busy turning big cakes into tiny crumbs!
meanings.sent4: Her ability to simplify complex ideas is like the work of saccharases on sugars.
meanings.sent5: The saccharases worked tirelessly, transforming the sugar molecules into smaller units.
